TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewGroupCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListViewGroupCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表 控制項內的群組集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of groups within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得聯控制項。Use the property to get the associated with a control. 此集合包含代表顯示於控制項中之群組的物件時以外的其他屬性設定為值。This collection contains the objects that represent the groups shown in the control when the property is set to a value other than . 不會指派給群組的任何項目會出現在預設群組中，具有標頭標籤"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 預設群組未包含在集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要是用於偵錯，以確保所有項目有已正確新增至群組。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 如果在沒有群組集合中，「 群組 」 功能已停用。If there are no groups in the collection, the grouping feature is disabled. 使用方法，將單一的群組加入至集合。Use the method to add a single group to the collection. 使用方法，將群組加入集合中的特定索引處。Use the method to add a group at a particular index within the collection. 若要移除的群組，請使用方法。To remove a group, use the method. 使用方法來移除特定索引處的群組。Use the method to remove the group at a particular index. 您無法新增不止一次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 若要重新定位在集合中的群組，您必須先從集合移除，並再插入所需的位置。To reposition a group within the collection, it must first be removed from the collection, and then inserted at the desired location. 使用方法，以判斷特定的群組是否已在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a particular group is already in the collection. 若要擷取群組，以在集合中的索引，請使用方法。To retrieve the index of a group within the collection, use the method. 您可以取得或設定群組與特定索引處索引子。You can get or set the group at a particular index with the indexer. 使用方法，將多個群組加入至集合。Use the method to add multiple groups to the collection. 您可以新增多個群組，為群組或做為陣列擷取透過他人財產控制項。You can add multiple groups either as an array of groups or as a that you retrieve through the property of another control. 使用方法來移除集合中的所有群組。Use the method to remove all the groups from the collection. > [!NOTE] > ， ，並方法，從集合中移除群組，但不是會移除任何項目控制項。The , , and methods remove groups from the collection, but do not remove any items from the control. 如果在沒有群組集合群組功能已停用和控制項中的所有項目會正常顯示。If there are no groups in the collection, the grouping feature is disabled and all items in the control are displayed normally. 並方法會很有用，當您想要提供多種方式可用來群組中的項目控制項。The and methods are useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a control. 若要這樣做，請建立多個群組陣列。To do this, create multiple group arrays. 若要變更群組，請先使用方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用方法來加入 [下一步] 的陣列，要顯示的群組。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the next array of groups to display. 使用方法，將群組複製到相容的陣列，指定索引處開始的集合中。Use the method to copy the groups in a collection to a compatible array starting at a specified index. 這非常有用，例如，當您想要排序群組在集合中使用方法。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the method. 若要這樣做，請將群組複製到相容的陣列，然後排序陣列。To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array. 接下來，使用方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用方法，將已排序的陣列加入集合。Next, use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection. 使用若要判定集合中有多少群組的屬性。Use the property to determine how many groups are in the collection. 若要逐一查看集合，使用傳回方法。To iterate through the collection, use the returned from the method. > [!NOTE] > 「 群組 」 功能在您的應用程式呼叫時僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。The grouping feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在舊版的作業系統，與群組相關的任何程式碼將會被忽略，並不會出現群組。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups will be ignored and the groups will not appear. 如此一來，取決於群組功能的任何程式碼可能無法正確運作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 您可能想要包含的測試，決定是否可以使用，「 群組 」 功能，並提供替代功能，無法使用時。You might want to include a test that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，您可以提供替代的排序時不支援依群組排序的作業系統上執行。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. > > 插入標記功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用來組織項目詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的分組功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭的項目排序到建立該資料行的群組。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次按一下相同的資料行標頭會回復群組的順序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加入現有至集合。Use this method to add an existing to the collection. 您無法新增不止一次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 當您呼叫方法使用已經在集合中，新增會失敗，則傳回-1。When you call the method using a that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned. 若要加入集合中的多個群組，請使用方法。To add multiple groups to the collection, use the method.

summary.span: 將群組陣列加入至集合。

span.span: Adds an array of groups to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此版本的方法，將群組陣列加入至群組集合。Use this version of the method to add an array of groups to the group collection. 這個方法很有用，當您建立多個物件，並想要將它們新增至具有單一方法呼叫的集合。This method is useful when you create multiple objects and want to add them to the collection with a single method call. 若要加入集合中的個別群組，請使用方法。To add individual groups to the collection, use the method. 這個方法也很有用時您想要提供多種方式可用來群組中的項目控制項。This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items in a control. 若要這樣做，請建立多個群組陣列。To do this, create multiple group arrays. 若要變更群組，請先使用方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用方法來加入群組的不同的陣列。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add a different array of groups. 不同於方法，方法沒有傳回值，可用來判斷是否要加入的群組已存在集合中。Unlike the method, the method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection. 如果您需要此資訊，請使用方法，然後再使用方法。If you need this information, use the method before using the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何方法可用的應用程式，會將組織詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的項目。The following example demonstrates how the method can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 針對每個資料行建立的群組會儲存在雜湊表，以及首字母的子項目文字。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭時，已清除。When a column header is clicked, the is cleared. 然後會擷取對應至所按資料行的雜湊表，每個項目指派給適當的群組。The hash table corresponding to the clicked column is then retrieved and each item is assigned to the appropriate group. 最後，將已排序的陣列的雜湊表中的群組新增至。Finally, a sorted array of the groups in the hash table is added to the . 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此版本方法來加入的項目擷取透過不同屬性控制項。Use this version of the method to add the elements of a that you retrieve through the property of a different control. 不同於方法，方法沒有傳回值，可用來判斷是否要加入的群組已存在集合中。Unlike the method, the method does not have a return value that can be used to determine whether a group being added is already in the collection. 如果您需要此資訊，請使用方法，然後再使用方法。If you need this information, use the method before using the method.

summary.span: 移除集合中所有的群組。

span.span: Removes all groups from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要從集合中移除所有群組中使用這個方法。Use this method to remove all the groups from the collection. 請注意，移除群組從集合並不會移除項目從控制項。Note that removing groups from the collection does not remove items from the control. 此方法相當實用，若要停用分組功能。This method is useful to disable the grouping feature. 當沒有任何群組中的控制，通常顯示的項目。When there are no groups in a control, the items appear normally. 若要從集合中移除個別的群組，請使用或方法。To remove individual groups from the collection, use the or method. 當您想要提供多種方式可用來群組項目時，這個方法也很有用。This method is also useful when you want to provide multiple ways to group the items. 若要變更群組，請先使用方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用方法來加入群組的不同的陣列。To change the grouping, first use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add a different array of groups. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何方法可用的應用程式，會將組織詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的項目。The following example demonstrates how the method can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 針對每個資料行建立的群組會儲存在雜湊表，以及首字母的子項目文字。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭時，已清除。When a column header is clicked, the is cleared. 然後會擷取對應至所按資料行的雜湊表，每個項目指派給適當的群組。The hash table corresponding to the clicked column is then retrieved and each item is assigned to the appropriate group. 最後，將已排序的陣列的雜湊表中的群組新增至。Finally, a sorted array of the groups in the hash table is added to the . 完整的範例，請參閱概觀參考主題。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法新增不止一次集合。You cannot add a to the collection more than once. 不過，嘗試加入另一個複本不會擲回例外狀況。However, attempting to add another copy will not throw an exception. 相反地，新增將會失敗。Instead, the addition will simply fail. 方法會在此情況下傳回 – 1 的值。The method will return a value of –1 in this case. 和方法，不過，沒有傳回值。The and methods, however, do not have return values. 新增時使用這些方法的其中一個群組，使用方法，以判斷是否特定已經存在於集合。When adding groups using one of these methods, use the method to determine whether a particular is already in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將集合 （包括其所包含的項目參考） 中的群組複製到相容的陣列，指定索引處開始。Use the method to copy the groups in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index. 這非常有用，例如，當您想要排序群組在集合中使用方法。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort the groups in the collection using the method. 若要這樣做，請將群組複製到相容的陣列，然後排序陣列。To do this, copy the groups into a compatible array, then sort the array. 接下來，使用方法，從集合移除所有群組，然後使用方法，將已排序的陣列加入集合。Next, use the method to remove all the groups from the collection, then use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection.
